record.field:
🌟 Let the Wild Begin

Welcome to Adventure Summer Camp —where kids unplug from screens and reconnect with nature, challenge themselves, and build friendships that last a lifetime. Set in the heart of the Belgian Ardennes, our adventure camp is all about movement, teamwork, and muddy boots. Every day brings a new thrill—from forest games to climbing and campfire stories.

🗓️ Programme Highlights

Our days are structured yet full of freedom—led by experienced guides and packed with variety:

  • 🌲 Nature Hikes & Survival Skills – Learn to read trails, build shelters, and identify plants.

  • 🧗 Climbing & Ropes Course – Safely challenge comfort zones on our climbing wall and low rope course.

  • 🌊 Water Fun – Kayaking and river games in shallow streams (lifejackets always).

  • 🔥 Evening Campfires – Songs, stories, and marshmallow roasting every evening.

  • 🧭 Team Missions & Games – Scavenger hunts, obstacle courses, and forest team challenges.

  • 🎨 Creative Downtime – Natural crafts, journaling, and painting with forest materials.

✅ What’s Included
❌ Not Included

  • Lodging in cozy, supervised cabins

  • 3 meals + 2 healthy snacks per day

  • All materials, gear, and safety equipment

  • Daily guided activities with trained staff

  • 24/7 supervision by certified coordinators

  • Welcome kit with water bottle, badge & field journal


  • Transport to/from the camp (optional shuttle service available)

  • Personal insurance

  • Pocket money (we don’t have a shop on-site)

  • Personal gear (e.g., clothing, toiletries – see ﻿﻿packing list﻿﻿)

Frequently Asked Questions

Our Adventure Camp is perfect for kids aged 8 to 13.

We handle allergies and medical needs with great care—just note everything during registration. Our staff is first-aid certified and always nearby.

Yes. All activities are supervised, age-appropriate, and use certified safety gear. We never push kids beyond their comfort zones.

Small group sizes of 8–10 campers per coordinator ensure personal attention and a strong group spirit.

field.name: tag_ids
field.eval: [ Command.clear(), Command.link(ref('event_tag_1')), Command.link(ref('event_tag_2')), Command.link(ref('event_tag_3')), Command.link(ref('event_tag_10')), Command.link(ref('event_tag_13')), ]

record.field:
✅ Next Steps

Thank you for booking your child’s place at Camp Adventure! We’re thrilled to welcome them to an unforgettable summer in the heart of the Ardennes.

Here’s what happens next:

  • 📬 Confirmation Email

    You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly with all your camp details, including dates, payment summary, and a digital copy of your welcome guide.

  • 🧳 Packing List

    A complete checklist will be sent 2 weeks before camp starts, with everything your child needs—from hiking shoes to silly costumes.

  • 🧾 Medical & Emergency Form

    Please complete the required forms before your child’s first day. You’ll find them linked in your email or through your parent dashboard.

  • 🕒 Stay Informed

    One week before camp, you’ll receive a reminder with drop-off and pick-up times, and details about our welcome desk.

Need to make changes? You can manage your booking anytime via your personal account.

🗺️ How to Get There

Camp Adventure – La Roche-en-Ardenne

Chemin des Fougères 17, 6980 La Roche, Belgium

📍 Tucked away in the lush forests near the Ourthe River, our camp is easily accessible by car or public transport.

  • 🚗 By Car:

    From Brussels, take the E411 towards Namur, then follow signs to Marche-en-Famenne and La Roche. Free parking is available on-site for drop-off and pickup days.

  • 🚉 By Train + Shuttle:

    Take a train to Marloie Station. From there, we offer a supervised shuttle service to camp for an extra fee. Don’t forget to book it in advance through your dashboard.

  • 🧭 Navigation Tip:

    Enter “Camp Sylva – Ardennes” into Google Maps or Waze. The entrance is marked by wooden signs and friendly faces!

🌟 Express, Create, Imagine

Welcome to Art & Creative Camp at Camp Sylva—a week-long adventure into color, creativity, and self-expression. Set in the peaceful forests of the Belgian Ardennes, this camp is designed for curious minds and messy hands. Campers dive into a wide range of artistic disciplines in a playful, encouraging environment that celebrates individuality.


🗓️ Programme Highlights

Our days are structured yet full of freedom—led by experienced guides and packed with variety:

  • 🖌️ Painting & Drawing – Daily workshops exploring different mediums like watercolor, acrylics, charcoal, and pastels.

  • 🎭 Theater & Storytelling – Improv games, costume play, and storytelling circles to build confidence and imagination.

  • ✂️ Crafting & Sculpture – From nature-inspired mobiles to clay modeling and recycled art.

  • 📸 Photography & Journaling – Document the week with your own eyes and words.

  • 🌳 Outdoor Creation – Paint with forest brushes, sculpt with clay from the riverbank, or sketch under the trees.

  • 🔥 Evening Talent Share – Campers can share songs, poems, skits, or creations by the campfire.

✅ What’s Included
❌ Not Included

  • Lodging in cozy, supervised cabins

  • 3 meals + 2 healthy snacks per day

  • All materials, gear, and safety equipment

  • Daily guided activities with trained staff

  • 24/7 supervision by certified coordinators

  • Welcome kit with water bottle, badge & field journal


  • Transport to/from the camp (optional shuttle service available)

  • Personal insurance

  • Pocket money (we don’t have a shop on-site)

  • Personal gear (e.g., clothing, toiletries – see ﻿﻿packing list﻿﻿)

Frequently Asked Questions

Our Adventure Camp is perfect for kids aged 8 to 13.

We handle allergies and medical needs with great care—just note everything during registration. Our staff is first-aid certified and always nearby.

Yes. All activities are supervised, age-appropriate, and use certified safety gear. We never push kids beyond their comfort zones.

Small group sizes of 8–10 campers per coordinator ensure personal attention and a strong group spirit.

✅ Next Steps

Thank you for booking your child’s place at Camp Arts! We’re thrilled to welcome them to an unforgettable summer in the heart of the Ardennes.

Here’s what happens next:

  • 📬 Confirmation Email

    You’ll receive a confirmation email shortly with all your camp details, including dates, payment summary, and a digital copy of your welcome guide.

  • 🧳 Packing List

    A complete checklist will be sent 2 weeks before camp starts, with everything your child needs—from hiking shoes to silly costumes.

  • 🧾 Medical & Emergency Form

    Please complete the required forms before your child’s first day. You’ll find them linked in your email.

  • 🕒 Stay Informed

    One week before camp, you’ll receive a reminder with drop-off and pick-up times, and details about our welcome desk.

Need to make changes? You can manage your booking anytime via your personal account.

🗺️ How to Get There

Chemin des Fougères 17, 6980 La Roche, Belgium

📍 Tucked away in the lush forests near the Ourthe River, our camp is easily accessible by car or public transport.

  • 🚗 By Car:

  • 🧭 Navigation Tip:

🚀 Code, Create, Collaborate
Welcome to IT Summer Camp at Camp Sylva—a unique tech adventure for curious minds ready to dive into the world of programming, robotics, and digital creativity. Surrounded by nature but powered by innovation, campers will spend the week learning essential coding skills, tackling team challenges, and discovering the magic of building things that work.

🗓️ Programme Highlights

  • 💡 Intro to Coding – Learn the basics of Python, Scratch, or HTML through fun, interactive projects.

  • 🕹️ Game Design – Build simple games, experiment with mechanics, and get feedback from peers.

  • 🤖 Robotics & Logic Challenges – Work with robots and sensors to solve physical problems.

  • 💬 Team Hackathons – Collaborate on themed challenges to build mini apps or solutions in small groups.

  • 🌐 Digital Citizenship – Discuss internet safety, creativity, and how to be a responsible digital citizen.

  • 🎤 Demo Day – Share your project with the group and celebrate what you’ve built!

✅ What’s Included
❌ Not Included

  • Lodging in cozy, supervised cabins

  • 3 meals + 2 healthy snacks per day

  • All materials, gear, and safety equipment

  • Daily guided activities with trained staff

  • 24/7 supervision by certified coordinators

  • Welcome kit with water bottle, badge & field journal


  • Transport to/from the camp (optional shuttle service available)

  • Personal insurance

  • Pocket money (we don’t have a shop on-site)

  • Personal gear (e.g., clothing, toiletries – see ﻿﻿packing list﻿﻿)

Frequently Asked Questions

Our Adventure Camp is perfect for kids aged 8 to 13.

We handle allergies and medical needs with great care—just note everything during registration. Our staff is first-aid certified and always nearby.

Yes. All activities are supervised, age-appropriate, and use certified safety gear. We never push kids beyond their comfort zones.

Small group sizes of 8–10 campers per coordinator ensure personal attention and a strong group spirit.
